formulas.raw: \[ m = \frac{\text{rise}}{\text{run}} \] If you know two points \((x_1, y_1)\) and \((x_2, y_2)\) on the line, \[ m = \frac{y_2 - y_1}{x_2 - x_1}, \quad x_2 \neq x_1. \]

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: \[ \text{grade (\%)} = 100 \cdot m. \] For example, \(m = 0.08\) corresponds to an 8% grade.
